1.content:
First of all, When starting a new branch (when you decide your gender), you get to choose the world that this takes place in. You must fill out this form:

----
Name of Zangoose:
Specific Age:
Diaper Normality?: (Yes / No)
Potty Training Age: (If diaper normality is on, then fill as NA)
Starting Setting:
----

With that out of the way, lets answer some questions:

What's your age?
1.title: Starting point

1121.content:
Which of these three adorable toddlers will we follow?

1. Eric, who has just started potty training.

2. Roy, who's making solid progress but still has a way to go.

3. Mack, who is almost ready for undies!
1121.title: Male

1211.content:
Name of Zangoose: Kyle
Specific Age: 6
Diaper Normality?: No
Potty Training Age: After elementary school
Starting Setting: In the suburbs of a Pokemon town.



Somewhere in a cozy small town, a happy little Pokemon was all curled up under his blanket in bed, when suddenly, a cute pikachu-themed alarm clock started to ring! “Pi-ka-chu~! Pi-ka-chu~! Pi-ka-click!” It didn’t even make it to three rings before an excited hand reached out from under the covers and shut it off. Excitedly, those blankets were thrown up in the air as a excited little zangoose boy leapt out of bed, anticipating the day ahead!

He rushed happily over the bathroom, brushing his teeth in the mirror with a cute comic book-themed toothbrush. Of course, there was a warm yellow spot in the front of his diaper, indicating that he’s wet himself overnight… but that was normal! He didn’t let it bother him as he marched happily down the stairs, walking up to his much larger zangoose mother. “Morning, mommy!”

“Morning, sweetheart!” She smiled, giggling when she turned to him. “Do you need a change, sweetie?” Of course, Kyle happily nodded, and his mother happily lifted the little guy up and carried him over to the changing table, where he liked to relax while his mother changed his diapers. “Are you excited for your first day of school, Kyle?”

“Oh, super duper excited! I’m gonna make so many friends, and learn, like, a bunch of stuff and things!” He smiled, his eyes sparkling with excitement. “Oooh, and give me one of my special diapies!” His mother smiled with a little roll of her eyes, but still slid one of his ‘special diapers’ on him.

They were even softer, thicker, and poofier than his regular diapers, and had all sorts of cool colors and patterns on them. They were too expensive to wear all the time, since he’d need new ones for every time he messed… but on his first day of school, he wanted to make a good first impression!

Once she’d dressed him with a cute, poofy diaper colored with his favorite comic book characters, she led him by the hand to the kitchen. “Already have breakfast prepared for you, sweetie. Your favorite!”

He smiled brightly, seeing the breakfast laid out on the table. “Aw, mom! You’re the best!” She cooed happily, ruffling his hair as he hugged her hip. With that, he planted his comfy, padded rump down on one of the chairs to happily chomp down on his breakfast!

Eventually, he was all ready for the morning, with his backpack on his back, his lunchbag held in his hands, and of course, his perfect diaper ready to impress all the other kids with its sheer poofiness. “Have fun at school, sweetheart!” His mother smiled, leaning down to give him a kiss on the cheek.

“Hehe! I will!” He smiled, giving her another hug, before he had to finally run out the door to catch the school bus. “Bye mom! I love you!” She stood in the doorway, waving at him with a warm smile on her face, as he ran excitedly to the school bus.

Inside was a bunch of other kids, all wearing big, poofy diapers just like his! They weren’t going to have to worry about that boring potty training stuff until at least middle school, after all. Excited, he goes and sits down next to a...
1211.title: First Day of School!

info.brief_description: A story of countless accidents, limitless diapers, and a bunch of fluffy zangooses~
info.description:
Hello! Please make sure to read these rules before posting, or I will quickly delete your entry! No exceptions.

1. No major NSFW content! This includes: Sex, humping, Gore, etc
2. These fetishes are banned: Inflation, Major Weight Gain, Candy Gore, Vore, Feet.
3. All posts must have at least 3 or more sentences, and there must be 35 words or more.
4. Any grammar or spelling errors will be corrected by me. Post something that is too incoherent and I will delete it.
5. Think Semi-Realisticaly: If you're making a parent do something, as yourself: "Would this be considered child abuse?" If the answer is yes, then you shouldn't post it.
6. Hypermessing is allowed, but don't go too far! (Max is the size of two refrigerators.)
7. Have fun! ^^
